channel.title: Variables on syknapptic
channel.description: Recent content in Variables on syknapptic

item.title: Variable Assignment
item.description: R Python C++ Pure C++ Rcpp R var_R <- 1 var_R ## [1] 1 Python var_PY <- 1 print(var_PY) ## [1] 1 C++ Pure C++ #include <iostream> int main() { int var_CPP = 1; std::cout << var_CPP; return 0; } ## 1 Rcpp #include <Rcpp.h> // R to/from C++ interface // [[Rcpp::export]] int RCPP_function() { int var_RCPP = 1; return var_RCPP; } RCPP_function() # access the C++ function from R like any other function ## [1] 1
